webDisplayData.title: Digital Payments & FinTech Foundation
webDisplayData.businessDomain: Payment Processing, Financial Technology, and Creator Monetization Infrastructure
webDisplayData.summary: The Digital Payments Foundation encompasses the complete ecosystem of payment processing technologies, financial services, and monetization infrastructure that enables digital commerce and creator economy transactions. This foundation covers payment processors like Stripe and PayPal, creator payment platforms like Patreon and Ko-fi, and emerging fintech solutions for cross-border payments, cryptocurrency, and embedded finance.
